docs.text: About this site Hello! This site is a personal website for game developer Lei Zhao. I built and served this site for showing the portfolio and and development logs of my game projects, as well as other information about me that you might be interested in. My common id across the Internet is usually "bolicrad", which I made up at the very first when I started to surf the Internet. The word is meaningless, as I just wanted to bring up a cool id when I was a teenager. Try to discover me on any random corner of the Internet with that id. This site is provided in both English and Chinese , and might add a Japanese version in the future, if possible. Internal Links About Me Resume Portfolio Dev Logs External Links My Github Profile My LinkedIn Profile My itch.io Homepage Discord: Lei Zhao#9909 Mail to me
docs.title: About this site

docs.text: Hello! This site is a personal website for game developer Lei Zhao. I built and served this site for showing the portfolio and and development logs of my game projects, as well as other information about me that you might be interested in. My common id across the Internet is usually "bolicrad", which I made up at the very first when I started to surf the Internet. The word is meaningless, as I just wanted to bring up a cool id when I was a teenager. Try to discover me on any random corner of the Internet with that id. This site is provided in both English and Chinese , and might add a Japanese version in the future, if possible.

docs.text: 关于此网站 你好！这里是游戏开发者赵雷的个人网站。这里主要用于展示我的作品集，开发日志，以及其他一些你可能感兴趣的关于我的信息。 我在互联网上常用的ID是bolicrad，这是我当初刚刚开始网上冲浪时自己造的一个词，没有什么特别的含义，只是想听起来酷一点。你在很多网站应该都可以用这个ID搜到我，不必惊讶。 此网站提供 中文 和 英文 两个版本，未来如果有可能将提供日文版。 站内链接 个人简介 简历 作品集 开发日志 站外链接 Github主页 领英主页 itch.io主页 Discord: Lei Zhao#9909 电子邮件
